thread.section_title: Extra Value Checks Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Extra Value Checks | www.extravaluechecks.com | 5 of 161
thread.title: D. Cooper
thread.title_full: Extra Value Checks reviewed by D. Cooper

author: D. Cooper
title: D. Cooper
text: Though I don't write checks often anymore (maybe 3-4 a month); it is important that a consumer present a bank approved, official and trustworthy product. It also adds to the experience when the purchase is good quality, reasonably priced and delivered ahead of schedule. Thank you.
